page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT IN OUR AREA
page.content: THERE IS SOME EMPLOYMENT IN THE VILLAGE.PEOPLE ARE EMPLOYED IN THREE SHOPS THEY ARE ALSO EMPLOYED IN THE POST OFFICE, SCHOOL, THE POTTERY AND THE TWO PUBLIC HOUSES.TWO TEACHERS COME TO SCHOOL FROM SELKIRK AND JEDBURGH,THERE ARE ALSO FIVE VISITING TEACHERS.THE COOK AND THE CLEANER BOTH LIVE IN THE VILLAGE. AN ARTIST WORKS IN THE VILLAGE,AND THE POTTERY EMPLOYS TWO PEOPLE.THERE IS A HAIRDRESSER IN THE POST OFFICE.OUTSIDE THE VILLAGE THERE IS A SAWMILL AND THERE IS ALSO AN OFFICE WHERE PEOPLE CAN BOOK HOLIDAY HOMES.
